TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignedInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type SignedInfo = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Contains information about the canonicalization algorithm and signature algorithm used for the XML signature.

span.span: Contains information about the canonicalization algorithm and signature algorithm used for the XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表 <`SignedInfo`> 元素的 XML 數位簽章規格所定義的 XML 簽章。The class represents the <`SignedInfo`> element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. <`SignedInfo`> 項目，這是子元素的 <`Signature`> 項目，包含用於簽章，用來簽署和驗證，而參考，描述數位簽章演算法的規範化方法。The <`SignedInfo`> element, which is a subelement of the <`Signature`> element, contains the canonicalization method used for signing, the algorithm used for signing and validation, and references that describe a digital signature. 大部分情況下，您應該使用類別可從屬性來簽署與驗證 XML 數位簽章。For most scenarios, you should use the class available from the property to sign and verify XML digital signatures. 如需詳細資訊 <`SignedInfo`> 項目，請參閱在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 規格。For more information about the <`SignedInfo`> element, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CanonicalizationMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CanonicalizationMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the canonicalization algorithm that is used before signing for the current object.

span.span: Gets or sets the canonicalization algorithm that is used before signing for the current object.

value.span: 為目前的 物件簽署使用的標準化演算法 。

span.span: The canonicalization algorithm used before signing for the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性來表示使用統一資源識別元 (URI) 的字串 <`Canonicalization`> 元素的 XML 數位簽章。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represent the <`Canonicalization`> element of an XML digital signature. 使用屬性來指定套用至 XML 輸出的標準化演算法再執行計算簽章的類別。Use the property to specify the canonicalization algorithm applied to the XML output of the class before performing signature calculations. 使用這個屬性具有下表中列出的其中一個的 uri。Use one of the URIs listed in the following table with this property. |規範化方法Canonicalization Method|值Value| |-----------------------------|-----------| |標準的 XMLCanonical XML|http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315

這是預設方法。This is default method. 也定義在下列的靜態欄位： Also defined in the following static field: | |標準的 XML 註解Canonical XML with comments|http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315#WithComments

也定義在下列的靜態欄位： Also defined in the following static field: | |獨佔標準的 XMLExclusive Canonical XML|http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#

也定義在下列的靜態欄位： Also defined in the following static field: | |獨佔標準的 XML 註解Exclusive Canonical XML with comments|http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#WithComments

也定義在下列的靜態欄位： Also defined in the following static field: | 如需 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 規格在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanonicalizationMethodObject As Transform

summary.span: Gets a object used for canonicalization.

span.span: Gets a object used for canonicalization.
A object used for canonicalization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含所使用物件進行規範化之前簽署或驗證 XML 文件的類別。The property contains the object used by the class to canonicalize an XML document before signing or verifying. 屬性是唯讀的。The property is read-only. 您可以修改物件，這個屬性，藉由傳遞所需的轉換來的統一資源識別元 (URI) 內屬性。You can modify the object within this property by passing the desired transform Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the property.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property References As ArrayList
public: property System::Collections::ArrayList ^ References { System::Collections::ArrayList ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets a list of the objects of the current object.

span.span: Gets a list of the objects of the current object.
A list of the elements of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會使用一份物件，以表示``XML 數位簽章的項目。The property uses a list of objects to represent the `` elements of an XML digital signature. 使用屬性以描述轉換、 摘要演算法，和摘要式的 XML 數位簽章的值。Use the property to describe the transforms, digest algorithms, and digest values of an XML digital signature. 如需 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 規格在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SignatureMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SignatureMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

value.span: 目前 物件用於產生和驗證簽章的演算法名稱。

span.span: The name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性會使用字串統一資源識別元 (URI) 來代表``XML 數位簽章的項目。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represents the `` element of an XML digital signature. 使用屬性來指定要用於簽章產生和驗證演算法。Use the property to specify the algorithm to use for signature generation and verification. 這個屬性會識別建立 XML 數位簽章，包含雜湊，公開金鑰演算法、 訊息驗證碼 (Mac)，以及與邊框距離所涉及的所有密碼編譯函式。This property identifies all cryptographic functions involved in creating an XML digital signature, including hashing, public key algorithms, Message Authentication Codes (MACs), and padding. 使用這個屬性具有下表中的 uri。Use one of the URIs in the following table with this property. |簽章方法Signature Method|值Value| |----------------------|-----------| |HMAC-SHA1HMAC-SHA1|http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#hmac-sha1

也定義在下列的靜態欄位： Also defined in the following static field: | |使用 SHA1 DSADSA with SHA1|http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#dsa-sha1

也定義在下列的靜態欄位： Also defined in the following static field: | |使用 SHA1 RSARSA with SHA1|http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1

也定義在下列的靜態欄位： Also defined in the following static field: | 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML 簽章語法和處理規格](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).
